title: Drug pair of Cornus officinalis and Radix achyranthis bidentatae improves renal injury of hypertension by regulating metabolic reprogramming mediated by eNOS
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Lichao Qian, Zhongchi Xu, Yanran Chen, Zhao Gao, Tianjiong Luo, Lihua Wu, Yawei Zheng, Li Chen, Dongping Yuan, Shuai Ren, Yinxing Zhu
